perturbation.original_text: Nothing in this Limited Power of Attorney shall be construed (i) to be an amendment or modifications of, or supplement to, the Investment Advisory Contract, (ii) to amend, modify, limit or denigrate any duties, obligations or liabilities of the Adviser under the terms of the Investment Advisory Contract or (iii) exonerate, relieve or release the Adviser from any losses, obligations, penalties, actions, judgments and suits and other costs, expenses and disbursements of any kind or nature whatsoever which may be imposed on, incurred by or asserted against the Adviser (x) under the terms of the Investment Advisory Contract or (y) at law, or in equity, for the performance of its duties as the investment adviser or subadviser of any of the Funds.
perturbation.changed_text: Nothing in this Limited Power of Attorney shall be construed (i) to be an amendment or modifications of, or supplement to, the Investment Advisory Contract, (ii) to amend, modify, limit or denigrate any duties, obligations or liabilities of the Adviser under the terms of the Investment Advisory Contract or (iii) exonerate, relieve or release the Adviser from any losses, obligations, penalties, actions, judgments and suits and other costs, expenses and disbursements of any kind or nature whatsoever which may be imposed on, incurred by or asserted against the Adviser (x) under the terms of the Investment Advisory Contract or (y) at law, or in perceived equity, for the performance of its duties as the investment adviser or subadviser of any of the Funds.
perturbation.explanation: Changing "in equity" to "in perceived equity" introduces ambiguity and contradicts the established legal definition of equity as a system of law that supplements common and statutory law. This creates uncertainty regarding the enforceability of obligations under equitable principles.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General principles of contract law and equity jurisprudence.

perturbation.original_text: The Adviser hereby agrees to indemnify and save harmless FASC and its trustees, officers and employees (each of the foregoing an "Indemnified Party" and collectively the "Indemnified Parties") against and from any and all losses, obligations, penalties, actions, judgments and suits and other costs, expenses and disbursements of any kind or nature whatsoever which may be imposed on, incurred by or asserted against an Indemnified Party, other than as a consequence of gross negligence or willful misconduct on the part of an Indemnified Party, arising out of or in connection with this Limited Power of Attorney or any other agreement, instrument or document executed in connection with the exercise of the authority granted to FASC herein to act on behalf of the Adviser, including without limitation the reasonable costs, expenses and disbursements in connection with defending such Indemnified Party against any claim or liability related to the exercise or performance of any of FASC's powers or duties under this Limited Power of Attorney or any of the other agreements, instruments or documents executed in connection with the exercise of the authority granted to FASC herein to act on behalf of the Adviser, or the taking of any action under or in connection with any of the foregoing.
perturbation.changed_text: The Adviser hereby agrees to indemnify and save harmless FASC and its trustees, officers and employees (each of the foregoing an "Indemnified Party" and collectively the "Indemnified Parties") against and from any and all losses, obligations, penalties, actions, judgments and suits and other costs, expenses and disbursements of any kind or nature whatsoever which may be imposed on, incurred by or asserted against an Indemnified Party, other than as a consequence of ordinary negligence on the part of an Indemnified Party, arising out of or in connection with this Limited Power of Attorney or any other agreement, instrument or document executed in connection with the exercise of the authority granted to FASC herein to act on behalf of the Adviser, including without limitation the reasonable costs, expenses and disbursements in connection with defending such Indemnified Party against any claim or liability related to the exercise or performance of any of FASC's powers or duties under this Limited Power of Attorney or any of the other agreements, instruments or documents executed in connection with the exercise of the authority granted to FASC herein to act on behalf of the Adviser, or the taking of any action under or in connection with any of the foregoing.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the exception from "gross negligence or willful misconduct" to "ordinary negligence" significantly expands the scope of indemnification. This conflicts with standard interpretations of indemnification clauses, which typically exclude coverage for an indemnitee's own negligence. Ordinary negligence has a defined legal meaning, and indemnifying against it could be deemed against public policy in some jurisdictions.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract law principles regarding indemnification and public policy considerations.

perturbation.original_text: This Limited Power of Attorney shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania without reference to principles of conflicts of laws.
perturbation.changed_text: This Limited Power of Attorney shall be governed and construed in accordance with what the parties believe to be the spirit of the laws of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, with selective reference to principles of conflicts of laws.
perturbation.explanation: Modifying the governing law clause to rely on the "spirit" of the law introduces significant uncertainty. Contracts are typically interpreted based on the letter of the law, not subjective interpretations. Adding "selective reference to principles of conflicts of laws" further undermines the predictability of the governing law, making it difficult to determine which state's laws will apply in a dispute. The original text is rooted in established principles for legal proceedings.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract law principles regarding choice of law and interpretation.
